House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08275
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7277, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "MAGNA CARTA FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITY"
ABSTRACT : Intends to allow elderly citizens to avail in advance, of the 80% cash benefit given to centenarians upon reaching the age of eighty (80), with the remaining 20% thereof be given upon reaching the age of one hundred (100).
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CALIXTO-RUBIANO, EMI G.
